headline: KLA (KLAC) Dips More Than Broader Market: What You Should Know
summary: KLA (KLAC) reached $1 at the closing of the latest trading day, reflecting a -4.2% change compared to its last close.

headline: Can AI-Driven Foundry Demand Drive LRCX's Systems Revenue Growth?
summary: AI-driven foundry demand lifts Lam Research's systems revenues 48.3% YoY to $3.55B, with foundries comprising 60% of sales in the first quarter of fiscal 2026.

raw.headline: Can AI-Driven Foundry Demand Drive LRCX's Systems Revenue Growth?
raw.summary: AI-driven foundry demand lifts Lam Research's systems revenues 48.3% YoY to $3.55B, with foundries comprising 60% of sales in the first quarter of fiscal 2026.

headline: How AI Driven Upgrades Are Rewriting the Story for KLA
summary: KLA’s fair value estimate has been nudged higher to about $1,296.89 per share as analysts grow more confident that AI driven wafer fab investment will support stronger, longer lasting demand for the company’s process control tools. At the same time, a slightly higher discount rate and modestly upgraded revenue growth outlook reflect a market that is balancing rising conviction in KLA’s role in the next wafer fab upcycle with lingering macro and policy risks. Read on to see how you can stay...
